samples.context: If Jim cleans his room, he will receive a reward. And if he receives a reward, he will use it to buy a new toy. So, Jim decided to tidy up his room, hoping to earn a reward. He diligently gathered his clothes, organized his toys, and dusted every surface. After a few hours of hard work, Jim's room was spotless.

qa_pairs.question: If jim cleaned his room , does this imply that he will buy a new toy?
If jim didn't clean his room, does this entail that he won't buy a new toy?
If jim cleaned his room , does this imply that he won't buy a new toy?
If jim didn't clean his room, does this imply that he will buy a new toy?

samples.context: Paul loves playing video games for hours on end. However, he knows that if he indulges too much, he will become mentally exhausted. samples.context: If Paul studies for his exams, then he will get good grades. If he gets good grades, he will feel a sense of pride within himself. Paul, being a diligent student, understood the importance of studying for his exams. He devoted long hours and put in immense effort to prepare for each subject. As the days went by, Paul could feel himself becoming more confident in his understanding of the material. The moment of truth arrived, and Paul sat down to take his exams. He answered each question to the best of his abilities, trusting in his preparation. When the results were finally announced, Paul's hard work paid off, and he achieved excellent grades. As he saw his grades, a feeling of pride swelled within him. He knew that his dedication and commitment had paid off, and he couldn't help but feel a sense of accomplishment.

qa_pairs.question: If paul studies for his exams, does this entail that he will be proud of himself?
If paul doesn't study for his exams, does this imply that he won't be proud of himself?
If paul studies for his exams, does this imply that he won't be proud of himself?
If paul doesn't study for his exams, does this entail that he will be proud of himself?
